Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: waveform
Description: Go package capable of generating waveform images from audio streams. MIT Licensed.

Name: rtorrent_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from rTorrent. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.

Name: raw
Description: Package raw enables reading and writing data at the device driver level for a network interface.  MIT Licensed.

Name: wireguard_exporter
Description: Command wireguard_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for WireGuard devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: scanrs
Description: A port scanner written in Rust, as an exercise to learn more about Rust! MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
